text: Susan Marie Olsen (born August 14, 1961) is an American actress, singer, voice actress, animal welfare advocate, artist and former radio host. known for portraying the youngest daughter Cindy Brady on the ABC 1969-1974 television series sitcom The Brady Bunch. ==Other websites== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Santa Monica, California Category:American voice actors
title: Susan Olsen
